price: Enti monni asadeε a moanya no mu deε εkwan wͻ ho na εyε; na monsuro Nyankopͻn. Nokorε sε, Nyankopͻn ne Bͻnefakyε Hene, na Ɔno ara nso ne Mmͻborͻhunufoͻ Hene.
arabic: فَكُلُواْ مِمَّا غَنِمۡتُمۡ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗاۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fakulū mimmā ghanim'tum ḥalālan ṭayyiban wa-ittaqū al-laha inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
